txt.en: 'Did you get your fireworks mixed up? Be sure to watch the announcer carefully next time.'

'Welcome, one and all, to the annual Bree Fireworks Celebration!

'Step right up and become a part of the show! That's right, we want YOU to participate in the show... the more, the merrier!

'Take these fireworks and launch the correct one when it is called for. That's it... just be sure to watch carefully, so you don't set off the wrong one!'
'Did you get your fireworks mixed up? Be sure to watch the announcer carefully next time.'
Fireworks in Bree

You launched the incorrect firework
The Firework Show has ended, come back again during the next night
The fireworks area is found near the North-gate of Bree.\n\nYou should launch the correct fireworks as the conductor calls out the colour.
You've launched the correct firework
Winston Peartree is at the fireworks area near the North-gate of Bree.\n\nYou should talk to Winston Peartree about your performance in the fireworks show.
You launched the incorrect firework
Watch carefully as the conductor calls out the colour of firework you need to launch.

Talk to Winston Peartree
Do not launch the wrong firework
Do not launch the wrong firework
Winston Peartree has orchestrated a fireworks show for the good folk of Bree.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
'Well done, [placeholder]! Your timing and coordination was perfect! I'm sure that everyone watching was thoroughly entertained.\n\n'Please take this, as a thanks for your brilliant participation.'
